doc:
Nigel Green https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigel_Green 0 Nigel McGown Green (15 October 1924 – 15 May 1972) was an English character actor. Because of his strapping build, commanding height (6 feet 4 inches) and regimental demeanour he would often be found playing military types and men of action in such classic 1960s films as Jason and the Argonauts, Zulu, Tobruk and The Ipcress File. Nigel_McGown_Green ( 15_October_1924 – 15_May_1972 ) was an_English_character_actor . Because_of his_strapping_build , commanding height_(_6_feet 4_inches ) and regimental_demeanour he would_often_be_found_playing military_types and men of action in such_classic_1960s_films as Jason and the_Argonauts , Zulu , Tobruk and The_Ipcress_File .
